lead_paragraph: A stunning second-half strike by 18-year-old Manuel Locatelli gave AC Milan a 1-0 win over Juventus after the Serie A titleholders had a goal controversially disallowed on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Locatelli Gives Milan Controversial Win Over Juve
headline.main: Locatelli Gives Milan Controversial Win Over Juve

snippet: A stunning second-half strike by 18-year-old Manuel Locatelli gave AC Milan a 1-0 win over Juventus after the Serie A titleholders had a goal controversially disallowed on Saturday....
